title: Game Keeper
text: Full Stack boardgame website to search and store board games. Created with the MVC structure with JavaScript, CSS,Express,Sequelize. Deployed on Heroku.

title: My2Cents
text: Progressive web app budget tracker. Can enter expenses and deposits offline and will enter once back online.Stats page to see over time.

title: Giftionary Page
text: a fun web app that allows you to search any word and get a gif, definition and random quote about your word using the giphy API written using Javascript, jQuery, css and HTML.

title: Catch Em All Page
text: site to store wishlist of pokemon and ones caught using mySQL, Javascript, Express and Handlesbars.

title: Employee Tracker CLI
text: A Node app interface to help manage employee data stored in a MySQL database.

title: How's the Weather Page
text: Website that shows the current and 5 day forecast for any city you search for. Includes Temp, Humidity, wind speed and UV index.
